tools.name: internet_search_tool
tools.description: Search the internet for information to answer questions about current events or general knowledge.

tools.name: search_internet_strucutred_output
tools.description: Search the internet and return comprehensive structured output with detailed search results including knowledge graphs, organic results, related questions, and more.

tools.name: search_images_from_internet
tools.description: Search the internet specifically for images on a given topic, returning detailed image metadata and source information.

tools.name: search_news_from_internet
tools.description: Search for news articles on a specific topic with customizable time range, returning structured results with article metadata.

tools.name: search_places_from_internet
tools.description: Search for places, businesses, and locations, returning structured geographic and business data including ratings, contact information, and coordinates.

tools.name: browser_manipulation_toolkit
tools.description: A comprehensive toolkit for browser automation including navigation, clicking elements, extracting content, filling forms, taking screenshots, and other webpage interactions.
